original_response.summary: Barack Hussein Obama is an American politician who served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He previously served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and as an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004. A member of the Democratic Party, Obama was the first African-American president.

standardized_response.result: Barack Hussein Obama is an American politician who served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. He previously served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and as an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004. A member of the Democratic Party, Obama was the first African-American president.
